title: Playground, Elevator Access, 2 Spas, Swimming Pool
map_address: 23639 Newhall Ave. near Meadow Ridge Drive
posting_body: ['$500', 'Canyon Crest', '23639 Newhall Ave., Santa Clarita, CA, 91321', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 61', 'OR Text', '61', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Newly Renovated Apartment Homes', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 690 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'If you’re looking to find a home in Santa Clarita, CA, make sure that home is Canyon Crest Apartments.', 'The location is highly attractive residentially and places you near major freeways such as Interstate 405, 5, and 210, which is ideal for commuting purposes.', 'So, come and tour our renovated one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes, each outfitted with fireplaces, high ceilings, and patios/balconies overlooking the area’s beautiful scenery.', 'Community amenities include an outdoor sky lounge, a playground, and conveniences such as a package service and online rent payments.', 'We’ve more than covered the basics in creating such a bright and enjoyable apartment experience – lease today and enjoy every minute of it.', 'Pet Policy', 'We are happy to hear that you and your pet have decided to make your new home at a Greystar community!', 'Before you move in, we ask that you review our breed restrictions and schedule an appointment so our office team can meet your pet.', 'Two animals or fewer allowed per apartment.', 'All animals must be six months or older.', 'In addition, a written and signed consent form, veterinarian statement, additional security deposit and registration may be required prior to moving your pet into the community.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5x', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', '8HBHjI4OW']
